idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# OPENING (C minor): G G G Eb — “short short short LONG”
# Integer-safe rhythm: short=1 beat, long=2 beats

def bev_figure(g, eb):
    playNote(g,  beats=1)
    playNote(eb, beats=2)

def bev_bar():
    bev_figure(67, 63)  # G4, Eb4
    # fill remaining  - total per bar = 4 beats
    rest( - (1+1+1+2) + 4 ) if False else None  # no-op; safely ignore

# SECTION LAYOUT (16 bars total)
# Bars 1–4: pure motif
for _ in range(4):
    bev_figure(67, 63)

# Bars 5–8: keep motif while light hats begin
for _ in range(4):
    bev_figure(67, 63)
    
    # Bars 9–12: harmonic lift (transpose up a whole tone: A, F)
for _ in range(4):
    bev_figure(67, 65)

# Bars 13–16: piano stops (tech-only)
# (no code here by design)

# Stop piano after 25 seconds (~50 beats)
rest(50)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# PAD ROOTS (bar-long notes), supports the transition
# Cmin -> Ab -> Bb -> G  (repeat)
# MIDI roots: C4=60, Ab3=56, Bb3=58, G3=55

def bar_root(n):
    playNote(n, beats=1); playNote(n, beats=1); playNote(n, beats=1); playNote(n, beats=1)

def four_bars():
    bar_root(60)  # C
    bar_root(56)  # Ab
    bar_root(58)  # Bb
    bar_root(55)  # G

# Bars 1–12: support piano
four_bars()
four_bars()
four_bars()

# Heavy outro bass note
for _ in range(8):
    playNote(36, beats=1)
# hold the last note
playNote(36, beats=4)

# Stop guitar after 30 seconds (~50 beats)
rest(50)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# HATS enter gradually
# Bars 1–4: silence
rest(16)

# Bars 5–8: quarters (soft build)
for _ in range(16):
    playNote(4, beats=1)

# Bars 9–12: busier 8ths (if 0.5 not allowed, keep quarters)
for _ in range(32):
    playNote(4, beats=1 if 0 else 1)  # keep as quarters for safety

    # Final outro beat (~30s): rapid finish pattern
# 4 bars of quick kicks to signal ending
for _ in range(8):
    playNote(0); rest(0.5)
    playNote(0); rest(0.5)
# finish with a single long hit
playNote(0, beats=2)
rest(2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# KICK grows to 4-on-the-floor
# Bars 1–4: none
rest(16)

# Bars 5–8: beats 1 & 3 (light)
for _ in range(4):
    playNote(0); rest(1); playNote(0); rest(1)

# Bars 9–12: beats 1, 2&, 3, 4& (keep integer: just do 1 & 3 for safety)
for _ in range(4):
    playNote(0); rest(1); playNote(0); rest(1)

    # Final outro beat (~30s): rapid finish pattern
# 4 bars of quick kicks to signal ending
for _ in range(8):
    playNote(0); rest(0.5)
    playNote(0); rest(0.5)
# finish with a single long hit
playNote(0, beats=2)
rest(2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# SNARE builds to 2 & 4
# Bars 1–4: none
rest(16)

# Bars 5–8: only beat 4 (subtle)
for _ in range(4):
    rest(3); playNote(2)

# Bars 9–12: backbeat on 2 & 4
for _ in range(4):
    rest(1); playNote(2); rest(1); playNote(2)

# Bars 13–16: keep 2 & 4 for tech drop
for _ in range(4):
    rest(1); playNote(2); rest(1); playNote(2)

    # Outro snare pattern for finale
for _ in range(4):
    rest(1); playNote(2); rest(1); playNote(2)
# one final hit
playNote(2, beats=2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# BASS evolves: none -> roots -> heavy pedal C for tech drop
# Low MIDI: C2=36, Ab1=44, Bb1=46, G1=43  (use the octave that sounds best)

def bar_quarters(n):
    playNote(n, beats=1); playNote(n, beats=1); playNote(n, beats=1); playNote(n, beats=1)

# Bars 1–4: silent
rest(16)

# Bars 5–8: simple roots (supporting the build)
bar_quarters(36)  # C
bar_quarters(44)  # Ab
bar_quarters(46)  # Bb
bar_quarters(43)  # G

# Bars 9–12: tighter/punchier (use higher octave for presence if you like)
bar_quarters(48)  # C3
bar_quarters(44)  # Ab2
bar_quarters(46)  # Bb2
bar_quarters(43)  # G2

# Bars 13–16: heavy tech drop — pedal C every beat
for _ in range(16):
    playNote(36, beats=1)

    # Heavy outro bass note
for _ in range(8):
    playNote(36, beats=1)
# hold the last note
playNote(36, beats=4)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# TOM grows to 4-on-the-floor
# Bars 1–4: none
rest(16)

# Bars 5–8: beats 1 & 3 (light)
for _ in range(4):
    playNote(0); rest(1); playNote(0); rest(1)

# Bars 9–12: beats 1, 2&, 3, 4& (keep integer: just do 1 & 3 for safety)
for _ in range(4):
    playNote(0); rest(1); playNote(0); rest(1)

# Bars 13–16: four-on-the-floor (every beat)
for _ in range(16):
    playNote(0); rest(1)

# Outro snare pattern for finale
for _ in range(4):
    rest(1); playNote(2); rest(1); playNote(2)
# one final hit
playNote(2, beats=2)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# OPENING (C minor): G G G Eb — “short short short LONG”
# Integer-safe rhythm: short=2 beat, long=2 beats

def bev_figure(g, eb):
    playNote(g,  beats=2)
    playNote(eb, beats=4)

def bev_bar():
    bev_figure(67, 63)  # G4, Eb4
    # fill remaining  - total per bar = 4 beats
    rest( - (1+1+1+2) + 4 ) if False else None  # no-op; safely ignore

# SECTION LAYOUT (16 bars total)
# Bars 1–4: pure Beethoven motif
for _ in range(4):
    bev_figure(67, 63)

# Bars 5–8: keep motif while light hats begin
for _ in range(4):
    bev_figure(67, 63)
    
    # Bars 9–12: harmonic lift (transpose up a whole tone: A, F)
for _ in range(4):
    bev_figure(67, 65)

# Bars 13–16: piano stops (tech-only)
# (no code here by design)

# Return of original for final note
playNote(67, beats=1)
playNote(63, beats=2)
rest(1)

# Stop piano after 25 seconds (~50 beats)
rest(50)
